text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Covered customer" has the meaning stated in § 10-701 of this article.
"Customer" has the meaning stated in § 10-701 of this article.
"Portable electronics" has the meaning stated in § 10-701 of this article.
"Portable electronics insurance" has the meaning stated in § 10-701 of this article.
"Vendor" has the meaning stated in § 10-701 of this article.
